title: Crushed
description: Emmalyn has loved one man her entire life. Her daddy When he is killed in a drunk driving accident, and her mother takes up with a creepy man who wants Em, her perfect life suddenly takes a drastic turn. Moving near Los Angels with her big sister Lacey and sister's boyfriend Jason is the best choice that Emmalyn ever made. Until she meets actor and playboy Ryan Alexander. He's sexy and he wants Emmalyn. But he doesn't want a relationship Or does he? Emmalyn also meets Ryan's best friend Alex who is about to go to work at his father's MC. Both men want Emmalyn. She wants one, but with a few jealous woman with very evil ways causing Emmalyn pain at every turn, who will she choose? Because she can only have one  She will love both, one will crush her and the other will put her back together before tragedy strikes tearing it all apart.**This is not a Cinderella story, Emmalyn goes through a lot of dark moments.There is no shortage of angst. This book contains scenes that may trigger those sensitive to sexual abuse. ****Mature Content for reader's 17+ Sexual content and language*
author: Shannon Alexander
